sn35.180-182:1.1: “Yam, bhikkhave, dukkham, tatra vo chando pahatabbo, rago pahatabbo, chandarago pahatabbo.
sn35.180-182:1.3: Rupa, bhikkhave, dukkha; tatra vo chando pahatabbo, rago pahatabbo, chandarago pahatabbo.
sn35.180-182:1.8: dhamma dukkha; tatra vo chando pahatabbo, rago pahatabbo, chandarago pahatabbo.
sn35.180-182:1.9: Yam, bhikkhave, dukkham, tatra vo chando pahatabbo, rago pahatabbo, chandarago pahatabbo”ti.
